TopicTitle: Parallel-sequential missions: allow returning to the past after completing a mission

Articles.Content:
5 hours ago, Pthigrivi said:

Because its self sufficient there’s no harm in underutilizing it. No biters are going to come chew through everything you’ve built. Thats just a choice based on how you’d like to play and there’s nothing wrong with that. 

I still don't want to underutilize it.
